name: Ext_R2_MedicationOrder_status
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.MedicationOrder.status for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationOrder.status from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationOrder|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: active | on-hold | completed | entered-in-error | stopped | draft
element.definition: A code specifying the state of the order.  Generally this will be active or completed state.
element.comment: `MedicationRequest.status` maps to R4 `MedicationRequest.status`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
element.isModifierReason: This extension is a modifier because the target element MedicationOrder.status is flagged IsModifier

element.short: active | on-hold | completed | entered-in-error | stopped | draft
element.definition: A code specifying the state of the order.  Generally this will be active or completed state.
element.comment: `MedicationRequest.status` maps to R4 `MedicationRequest.status`. So is mapped as Equivalent.

binding.description: A code specifying the state of the prescribing event. Describes the lifecycle of the prescription.
